MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 12:30PM  in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead to repair faulty equipment on the overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 2:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:39PM on 22nd March 2021.
